mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.trainee AS "trainee.id", a.score AS "score", a.train_item AS "trainItem.id", a.date AS "date", a.remarks AS "remarks", trainee.name AS "trainee.name", trainItem.name AS "trainItem.name"
LEFT JOIN trainee trainee ON trainee.id = a.trainee LEFT JOIN train_item trainItem ON trainItem.id = a.train_item
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM grade_daily a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.trainee LIKE '%'||#{trainee.id}||'%' '%'+#{trainee.id}+'%' concat('%',#{trainee.id},'%')
AND a.train_item LIKE '%'||#{trainItem.id}||'%' '%'+#{trainItem.id}+'%' concat('%',#{trainItem.id},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grade_daily( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, trainee, score, train_item, date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{trainee.id}, #{score}, #{trainItem.id}, #{date}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE grade_daily SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, trainee = #{trainee.id}, score = #{score}, train_item = #{trainItem.id}, date = #{date}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
